mapper.insert: MERGE INTO POSTS USING DUAL ON (NO = #{no}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt}, VIEWS = #{views} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (TITLE, CONTENT, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, VIEWS) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{views})
mapper.select: SELECT NO, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, VIEWS FROM POSTS ORDER BY NO DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
